ghostModes(long[]) - Static method in class interfaceFramework.Ghost

giveErrorMessage() - Static method in class logging.SignUp
This method uses the error booleans in order to generate a string that includes all the errors encountered during the signUp Process this string is then used to tell the player what needs to be changed in order to create his/her account.
